original:
The costs associated with cellular agriculture can vary significantly. While production costs may be relatively low, other expenses, such as those related to medicine, can be substantial. 

Public investment plays a crucial role in regulating and licensing cellular agriculture. It has been suggested that governments should leverage public spending to support this sector, as private firms and venture capital often prioritize maximizing i
